name: THE GENTLE BEAT OF A DRAGON BOAT
name_original: THE GENTLE BEAT OF A DRAGON BOAT
description:
A STORY OF HATE, FEAR, AND REDEMPTION

YOU HAVE TO PROVE YOURSELF

RACE THE FORMER VILLAGE CHAMPION

THEN VENTURE OUT SEA-WARD

MAKE YOUR WAY TO THE EYE OF THE STORM

THERE, YOU WILL FACE YOUR DESTINY - FIGHT IT

Controls

Look at the "Controls" menu for an explanation.

Press "escape" to pause.

Tapping the drum lightly will result in more turning and less forward movement, which is useful for getting out of tight spots!

Technical Details

Made with LÖVE for the 1-Bit Weekend Jam by David Khachaturov and Joonas Lima Suikki.

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/Davidobot/1bitJam

Dedicated to being young.
